analysis_general: The role states entry level, but recent 1 year minimum required is stated.  Can exclude qualified graduates and people returning to the workforce (parental leave). Perhaps rewriteas: Minimum one year of CAD experience required, with consideration given to candidates returning to the workforce or recent graduates who can demonstrate equivalent skills.
text: Description: This position is responsible for product documentation, including data entry, CAD, and general drafting tasks. The Drafter in primarily responsible for preparation of new drawings and incorporation of approved Engineering changes into existing documentation in an accurate and timely manner. Skills:* Solid. Works, AutoCAD, Drafting, Design, GD&T. Top Skills Details:* Solid. Works, AutoCAD, Drafting, Design. Additional Skills & Qualifications: Proficient operation of CAD (preferably CADKEY) and other PC based hardware/software. Minimum one year recent CAD experience. Experience Level: Entry Level. About Actalent: Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. Every day, our experts around the globe are making an impact. We’re supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world. Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development. Our people are the difference. Actalent is an operating company of Allegis Group, the global leader in talent solutions. The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.
